titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Inter-departmental Committee on Preparing Students for Foreign Service and International Affairs (University of Michigan) records

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

corpname.subordinate_name: Inter-departmental Committee on Preparing Students for Foreign Service and International Affairs

did.unittitle: Inter-departmental Committee on Preparing Students for Foreign Service and International Affairs (University of Michigan) records

archdesc.bioghist: Correspondence, questionnaire, questionnaire answers and substantiating data of study on international education sponsored by the Carnegie Endowment for International Peace and the American Council on Education; also contains two reports analysing the data submitted, namely: "Tentative draft report on explanatory survey of universities in world affairs," by Kenneth L. Heaton, 1950, and "The function and scope of international affairs at the University of Michigan," by Henry L. Bretton and Emma

corpname.subordinate_name: Inter-departmental Committee on Preparing Students for Foreign Service and International Affairs
